analysis.intraday_levels: SPY: $680 active support (69k OI), $700 active resistance (106k OI). QQQ: $620 immediate call wall resistance (34k OI), $615 max pain gravitational pull. Watch for dealer hedging dynamics at these strike boundaries.

QQQ: Resistance cluster $620-$640, support activation near $590-$580 if pullback materializes. Monitor max pain drift toward $681 SPY/$615 QQQ into next expiration.
